definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Beads of moisture perspired through the porous walls of the clay jug.
sentences.chinese: 水珠透过陶罐渗透性的罐壁渗了出来。

sentences.english: Dual-layer liquid formula has shinning watery texture.
sentences.chinese: 双层液体配方，明亮水珠质地。

sentences.english: Some materials such as Lotus leaves shed water because they are "superhydrophobic".
sentences.chinese: 有些材料如荷叶洒下水珠因为它是“极疏水的”。

sentences.english: Women love to cry, eyes like water.
sentences.chinese: 女人爱哭，泪眼就像水珠。

sentences.english: The dog shook off the drops of water.
sentences.chinese: 那狗抖落掉身上的水珠。

sentences.english: The pond has been changed forever because of that single,innocent droplet.
sentences.chinese: 只是一滴简单的水珠，永远地改变了这个池塘。

sentences.english: When it cools down, water droplets freeze.
sentences.chinese: 当空气冷却时，水珠凝结。

sentences.english: The tissue can effectively block the spread of droplets containing germs.
sentences.chinese: 面纸可有效阻隔含菌小水珠的散布。

sentences.english: A few sprinkles on the window began to indicate that it was raining.
sentences.chinese: 车窗上开始有几滴水珠，表明下雨了。

sentences.english: Beads of water cling to its screen, necklaces unstrung.
sentences.chinese: 水珠粘附在后门的纱屏上，就像松开了的项链珠子。
积雨云中的水珠在气溶胶附近形成。

sentences.english: Workers rake up globs of oil, which have come ashore on the beaches.
sentences.chinese: 工人以犁耙铲除已漂到海滩上岸的油水珠。

sentences.english: Outside, the rain had stopped but the glass was still pebbled with bright drops.
sentences.chinese: 窗外的雨已经停了，但玻璃上还是布满明亮的水珠。

sentences.english: Office of the top milk- hung upside down, the length and breadth, the water dropping, pleasant - sounding.
sentences.chinese: 厅顶乳石倒挂，星罗棋布，水珠滴落，悦耳动听。

sentences.english: When the sun comes out, the droplets shine bright on the yellow leaves.
sentences.chinese: 太阳出来时，晶莹的水珠在黄色的树叶上闪闪发亮。

sentences.english: The beards of the young men glisten'd with wet, it ran from their long hair.
sentences.chinese: 青年们浸湿的胡子闪闪发光，水珠从长发上滴落。

definition: water spot/water stain/wet spot/damp patch/water damage
to moisten/to dampen/to be steeped in/to be imbued with
(of a vapor etc) to rise/to hang in the air
